question: Mahdi Dream Assalam 3alykom, This was a very blurry dream with confusing images.
answer:
QUESTION
In my dream, I saw big crowds of people fighting. Afterwards I realized that we were the army of the promised mahdi, and I was among those people. I did not see who we were fighting. But what is confusing me is that it all seemed like a part of a big science-fiction movie, such as star-wars. There were also some unknown small creatures on our side, and they using some magic like we see on the television, they had long magician poles, and they issued x-rays out of them. Then, at the end of my dream, I heard someone yelling that rasul allah Muhammad (salla allah 3alyhi wa sallam) is coming, I remember looking back and seeing a camel, but I do not remember seeing him. I am confused, I don?t know if my dream has any significance or if it was just another dream! What are your thoughts? Thank you, jazakom llah khayran
ANSWER


Share:
The world is filled with evil and corruption. Imaam Mahdi (AS) will come
before the final hour. He will kill Dajjaal who will perform magic.

The only solution to all evils is adhering to the laws of Allah as shown to
us by Rasulullah [Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam].

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
